name: Anonymous G
text: Has active dine in, but only sanitize the tables when it's convenient. Several different customers will sit down take off their mask and eat at a table before they get cleaned. …More

name: Chris
text: I just discovered Blaze pizza about 3 months ago thanks to a friend of mine. I have to say I really like it. The pizza is amazing and the it’s actually relatively cheap. I think part of the reason I hadn’t tried it was because I feared it …More

name: J.R. Martino
text: Food’s great. Servers aren’t friendly and when we used curbside pickup we called but no one  answered. We went in to pick up our pizzas and the people behind the counter were standing around doing nothing and went “oh, sorry” after we told them no one answered the carry out number. Great food, service is poor at best.

name: ray morrow
text: It's a fun differnt take on pizza and the gluten free crusts is amazing when crispy I prefer it! It's worth giving a try and definetly nice to have a mto style pizza that you can order for 1. If your not a fan of thin crust it may not be the place for you. But pizza should be about the toppings not the darn bread

name: Pat Pschirer
text: I had never heard of the place prior to going in. Needed somewhere quick to eat. In, eating, out took 30 minutes. …More

name: Justin McCoy
text: Great place to get a Keto Pizza. I am low carb the keto crust pizza here is really good and worth the price. I would recommend this place to people who lile custom pizzas.

name: Kirk Mousessian
text: Great service. Pizza is not near quality but the price and selection make the kids happy. Thats their niche

name: Hayley Dupree
text: Delicious custom pizza with healthy options! Best pizza ever!

name: Kaylee Pacelli
text: It was a really nice, clean place with great employees. The tall guy with the accent was really cool and sweet. Managers were awesome . Overall it was a great experience :)

name: Bobbi Lynn Bouchon
text: Delicious pizza, great service... The GM John is the best! He's very professional and hard working. Blaze is lucky to have such an awesome manager!

name: Scott Cox
text: Let it be known!!! On this day august 5th 2020!!! Blaze pizza made the best pizza ever in human history! In the cleanest ,most professional location in existence! Just saying!

name: Naor Wallach
text: Stopped here for lunch and was both impressed and disappointed by what we found.  On the good side,  the staff could not have been nicer in explaining everything available and the options for changing things.  For the price, the portions …More

name: Taha Zafar
text: I had a great first experience at blaze pizza. The staff was very helpful in assisting me since I never ordered from this restaurant. It’s a great place to come and eat. I highly recommend trying it out. I will definitely be back here.

name: matt keifer
text: Wonderful place to eat. My wife has a gluten allergy and they took every precaution from changing spoons and brushes and gloves when making her pizza. The staff is fast and very friendly. The pizza is delicious and the ingredients are …More

name: Elizabeth Shniper
text: The pizzas are a nice size, and the choice of toppings was formidable.  Enjoyed being able to have a cauliflower crust, and have handfuls of arugula added to the top after it had been baked.  My niece and nephew love Blaze Pizza, and highly recommended it to us.  Even the drinks were fancy flavors like prickly pear.

name: Valerie Squire
text: Amazing. Something for everyone. Gluten free, and vegan cheese. All meats, cheeses, veggies. Glove change for gluten free. The pizza was so good. Can't wait to go back. The workers were all so nice too. Greet you as soon as you walk in.

name: Chad Quinn
text: Good spot for custom made pizza.  Ours took a little longer than we expected, but the place was absolutely packed. …More

name: Steve Musciano
text: I arrived at 750 and it said open the door was open. As I approached the counter the young man says we are closed. Now I get I am arriving late 10 mins to closing but even so I would think you close at 8 so you take orders to 8 and close …More

name: Brad Robinson
text: This was such a pleasant experience that I walked away saying they deserve a good review. Delicious. And they gave me a free cookie!

name: Sheena Bosoworth
text:
Gluten free /vegan cheese/ fresh veggie toppings
Done in 15 ....gr8t!

name: Gonzalo Vega
text: Found this gem on my way to a nearby place and I was pleasantly surprised. Food was pretty good and service was overall good. There seemed to be some standoffish personalities but they could have been having a bad day. I'll definitely go again for the food, but we'll see if the experience changes at all

name: Len Sabo
text: The pizza was good but not fantastic. The service was quick...even though the store was slammed for Pi day. All pizzas were only $3.14!!! …More

name: lynn Bryant
text: They have the best pizza! And a vegan cheese that's super creamy. And staff that makes the experience worth the trip.

name: May Rockefeeler
text: A few months ago, my friend and I went to this Blaze for some pizza. It was our first time here and unfortunately, our last. The employee who was supposed to help us was very rude and unhelpful. She had brown hair and glasses and was not …More

name: R RAJ
text: 1st time. Not bad. Lots of competition in Western Pennsylvania. Unique experience. I give it a five stars for the concept, but 4 stars for the pizza.

name: Justin Giles
text: This location is always amazing and very friendly.

name: Jocelyn Monacelli
text: Great pizza and salad. Go see John and the crew at the South Fayette location.  Every business should have such a great staff representing their products.

name: Ally Smith
text: Most of the employees were excellent and very nice. However, one girl that had brown hair that took our order was plain rude and impatient. I asked her what the vegetarian options were for the toppings and she could not respond to us with …More

name: Mary Anne Meade
text: This is my new GoTo place!  I love pizza and this is pretty darn good. Fresh, hot, lots of options! I've the food and if you haven't already, you should check it out!

name: Anna Elizabeth Turkovich
text: Fast, cheap, and absolutely delicious. Loved our experience here.

name: Dan Rohrer
text: I came here to use a coupon for a free pizza. I would have been happy with the food at its normal price, about $8-$10. There are dozens of sauces, cheeses, and toppings to choose from. The staff was courteous and keeps pizzas going through …More

name: Grimhaunted
text: Great place for pizza, build your own and have great deals. Good trendy place with lots of young staff and customers, good place to just hang out if you want or order and go. I love the garlic knots and the regular red because on the pizza is great. I would recommend.

name: ray h
text:
Surprisingly not bad. Crust is very thin. Has some flavor. Red sauce is bland. The cheese is good.
It works though. I’ll come back when I want a quick pizza.
Staff was friendly. Service was quick. I came at off peak hours.

name: Grant Curlis
text: The service is better than it really needs to be. I've never had to wait longer than 10 minutes for an order. Any concerns I've expressed to the staff were met with immediate action. The food is very good, and they offer vegetarian options, as well as the new keto crust. This is just a really good (and different) take on pizza.

name: Beyleigh Duda
text: Unique pizza place , food line style, pick your sause , pick your cheese , pick your meat , veggies , and put it in the hot as hell pizza oven, it's out in a few minutes. Personally love the pick 2 option. Fairly large salad and half a …More

name: Practical Applications
text: Customer service is everything. A great crew of happy people make a world of difference.  This blaze pizza location has it all. The best people, and the best customer service I've ever seen. This place has great culture.

name: Seth Amaterasu
text: First time i went here. Its different but prrtty cool how you can customize your pizza. When its done it taste fantastic.

name: Julie Sandala
text: Food was pretty good

name: Brian Geho
text: Different twist on pizza. If Subway & Pizza Hut had a kid, they would name it Blaze. Pick a whole or half pie, pick the sauce, then add your toppings. Plus they have some awesome sides.

name: Chaya Dewan
text: No frills pizza place. I love the toppings options and the sauces. Just a great place to get your pizza that's not exactly oily and almost healthy :)

name: AlexSotoRoman
text: Excellent Service! The amount of toppings you can put on pizza is awesome! Great first experience!

name: Diana Patton
text: It was our first time there. The staff was very helpful and explained how it is done at Blaze and answered our questions.  We will definitely be returning.  The pizza was awesome.

name: Chastity Fleming
text: I love this place. Best lunch for a decent price!!

name: SB
text: Love this place in Bridgeville, PA  and their pizza. They have lots of choices. A little bit overwhelming first time deciding which to choose. But the students who work there makes it easier.

name: Anthony Di Paolo
text: Sat down to eat here, not a single clean table in the place. My girlfriend’s son said about the tables: “it looks like the inside of a toilet.” The food isn’t good, I don’t understand the popularity.

name: Lori Lober
text: Excellent keto pizza. We really enjoyed it. Will be my new place to go when I crave pizza. Kids liked the regular pizza too. Everyone was very nice.

name: L. McMaster
text: Thank you for having vegan cheese. Very tasty pizza!

name: Rick Anderson
text: Very good. Worth the wait for a good price

name: L Brown
text: Great fresh quick pizza and the customer service is beyond EXCELLENT - especially the manager!!  He wants everything to be perfect and your experience to be great and he helps make it!!  The employees are all friendly and caring too!! …More

name: CJ SH
text: Pricey but very good

name: News Now Bethel Park
text: Very bland, sad pizza. Has the flavor and texture of a cheap frozen pizza. No interest in returning with dozens of other fresh options in the area. I would rather pay a buck or two more for better quality.

name: Chris Williams
text: First time going to one of these places, i ordered the White Top pizza. It was super good. They have a couple pizzas that they create but you can also chose your own toppings. Pizzas come out super fast. But if you're not a fan of thin crust pizza this night not be your place

name: Katjie Rumbaugh
text:
Good place, very nice friendly workers.
Except Olivia, who had a bad attitude with her co-worker. Not what a customer wants to listen to....

name: Furry Buddy
text: Very good food, alot of choices and good prices

name: Robert Smith
text: Very good pizza at a reasonable price and fast service

name: Gary Paul

name: Dome Italy
text: Not bad pizza at all considering american standards. A little small but decent ingredients

name: Michelle Sturm
text: Favorite pizza place by far!  I get a build your own pizza with 4 different cheeses(mozzarella, goat, parm and ricotta), bacon, ham, pineapple, sea salt and oregano.  Yummy!  (And I don't normally like pizza but I LOVE this one!)

name: Maisha G
text: Staff so cheerful and expedient, forgot to take my friend's order!

name: Margaret Wood
text: The salads are perfect, the employees were friendly. The donut sized pizza dough with some spices inside and Mariana sauce were ok for a quick snack.

name: Joe Cararie
text: I love the assembly line pizza preparation. They have fresh ingredients and the folks behind the counter are friendly and genuinely look to make your pizza to your exact specification. The pizza and garlic dough knots are delicious! My favorite is the Art Lover specialty pizza.

name: Tony Byron
text: Awesome place to go when you're having a really bad day. The folks behind the counter are the most engaging and cheerful people I have ever received service from. The food is awesome, pizzas are ready in 5 minutes or less and I love that I'm not limited on toppings and can build my pizza exactly the way I like.

name: chris klima
text: Similar to pieology but better prices

name: Chris R

text: These people kick butt!!!! Excellent food, excellent service.  I've been an IT tech for a ton of companies over the years.  I did work for these guys while sub contracting for NCR, hence I'm untouchable and answer to few, any way, these …More

text: It's the pizza world's version of subway. I enjoy this a lot because I like to make unique combinations. When you walk into the restaurant they take your name and ask you how many toppings. There's only one size 12 inch pizza which you can …More

text: Great pizza, tons of topping choices.  Lots of keto friendly/gluten free options available.

name: Steven Shaulis
text: It's OK. Pizza is ready quickly and plenty of toppings to pick from. Spinach & arugula salad  was good, and others looked good  too. It's noisy and assembly line style seems a little chaotic. They skipped making my salad on the way through, …More

text: Was just amazing!! They can acomodate vegans like a breeze!!

text: Wow!!! Amazing pizza. Super friendly staff. Really cheap prices.

text: It was as good as mass produced pizza could be. Nice concept but tasted pretty mediocre. Also cross contamination of ingredients occurred drastically.

name: Sean Duggan
text: The pizza was quite delicious, and built to order, and the staff was quite conscientious despite it's showing up on a day when they didn't have access to municipal water.

text: I really love the build your own option! Good topping selection and fresh ingredients! Will definitely be back

text: Awesome service,great pizza

text: They are doing so well at handling the large crowds as well as the online orders.  There are still some kinks to work out, but so far so good. Everyone is super friendly and helpful. I always look forward to going back

text: I love this place.  It's always delicious.  The service is great and I get to see my old students.

name: Molly Yang

text: What's not to love.   You walk up and order exactly what you want.  I  choose to build my own.   Proceed through the line choosing your toppings and the amount.   They throw it in the fire and call you in a very short time with your delicious pizza! 👍👌

text: Staff was kind cheerful and helpful,pizza was excellent restaurant was clean.

name: David Displayfireworks
text: This pizza is good? Are you kidding me. We ordered two after calling in for pick up. The crust taste like it needed cooked longer . The topping looked good but the taste was just not there. This pizza reminds me of something that bars sold …More

text: It's great if you love toppings, you can get unlimited toppings for the same price as though you'd get 3, $8.83 after tax. The dough-knots aren't anything to get excited about, they're not that flavorful, but that's fine as the pizza deal is fantastic and tastes great

text: Not very bust and they made my simple pie right.  (kind of hard to screw up but it's happen bedore at other locations) service was decent but the staff just didn't seem the most professional when watching them interact with one another or other customers.

name: Matthew Shuck
text: Pizza is pretty good, short wait, and fairly cheap for how good it is.  I ordered 2 pizzas and one came out slightly burnt, to a degree I wouldn't have even minded, but they insisted on giving me a new one anyway.  They won me over with that.

text: I love this place, the food is phenomenal, the service is the friendliest I have ever seen and the atmosphere is great
